1: הַ֥לְלוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> יָ֨הּ ׀ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n> הַֽלְלוּ־ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> אֵ֥ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> בְּקָדְשׁ֑וֹ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in his sanctuary</n> הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> בִּרְקִ֥יעַ <sup>7549 </sup> <n>him in the firmament</n> עֻזּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>of his power</n>
2: הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> בִגְבוּרֹתָ֑יו <sup>1369 </sup> <n>him for his mighty acts</n> הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> כְּרֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>him according to his excellent</n> גֻּדְלֽוֹ׃ <sup>1433 </sup> <n>greatness</n>
3: הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> בְּתֵ֣קַע <sup>8629 </sup> <n>him with the sound</n> שׁוֹפָ֑ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>of the trumpet</n> הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> בְּנֵ֣בֶל <sup>5035 </sup> <n>him with the psaltery</n> וְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <sup>3658 </sup> <n>and harp</n>
4: הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> בְתֹ֣ף <sup>8596 </sup> <n>him with the timbrel</n> וּמָח֑וֹל <sup>4234 </sup> <n>and dance</n> הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> בְּמִנִּ֥ים <sup>4482 </sup> <n>him with stringed instruments</n> וְעוּגָֽב׃ <sup>5748 </sup> <n>and organs</n>
5: הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> בְצִלְצְלֵי־ <sup>6767 </sup> <n>cymbals</n> שָׁ֑מַע <sup>8088 </sup> <n>him upon the loud</n> הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> בְּֽצִלְצְלֵ֥י <sup>6767 </sup> <n>cymbals</n> תְרוּעָֽה׃ <sup>8643 </sup> <n>him upon the high sounding</n>
6: כֹּ֣ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everything</n> הַ֭נְּשָׁמָה <sup>5397 </sup> <n>Let every thing that hath breath</n> תְּהַלֵּ֥ל <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> יָ֗הּ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הַֽלְלוּ־ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> יָֽהּ׃ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n>
